name: City XTrail Bike Stunts 2
description:
Ride on moto bike race stunt rider offers you various selections and modes of game play in motor racer.. Each level is more challenging and thrilling than the other level. It is time for exciting ride and crazy stunts. Use your motorcycle driving tricks and complete dangerous challenges and make all achievements of this bike stunt game. Drive bike and be careful, do not hit any vehicles and race track.
features
-Amazing stunning game of bike stunt.
-Enjoy the thrill with steering your bike.
-3d HD Graphics.
-3d environment in bike stunt racer game.
-Super Cool & nice Bike Models.
